About Me.


Hello,

My name is Wesley.

I study Computer Science & Neuroscience

at Brandeis University

I love technogy and see a future filled with

Intelligent Machines

I believe they will make our everyday lives more exciting and meaningful.

I have a strong background in

Software Engineering

Machine Learning

& Cognitive Science

and now, I want to be that part of intelligence.
